verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David the servant of the Lord.) Transgression <WH6588> speaks <WH5002> to the ungodly <WH7563> within <WH7130> his heart; <WH3820> There <WH369> is no <WH369> fear <WH6343> of God <WH430> before <WH5048> his eyes. <WH5869>
For it flatters <WH9140> him in his [own] eyes, <WH5869> Concerning the discovery <WH4672> of his iniquity <WH5771> [and] the hatred <WH8130> [of it.]
The words <WH1697> of his mouth <WH6310> are wickedness <WH205> and deceit; <WH4820> He has ceased <WH2308> to be wise <WH7919> [and] to do <WH3190> good. <WH3190>
He plans <WH2803> wickedness <WH205> upon his bed; <WH4904> He sets <WH3320> himself on a path <WH1870> that is not good; <WH2896> He does not despise <WH3988> evil. <WH9563>
Thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> O Lord, <WH3068> extends to the heavens, <WH8064> Thy faithfulness <WH530> [reaches] to the skies. <WH7834>

Thy righteousness <WH6666> is like the mountains <WH2022> of God; <WH410> Thy judgments <WH4941> are [like] a great <WH7227> deep. <WH8415> O Lord, <WH3068> Thou preservest <WH3467> man <WH120> and beast. <WH929>
How <WH4100> precious <WH3368> is Thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> O God! <WH430> And the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> take <WH2620> refuge <WH2620> in the shadow <WH6738> of Thy wings. <WH3671>
They drink <WH8248> their fill <WH7301> of the abundance <WH1880> of Thy house; <WH1004> And Thou dost give <WH8248> them to drink <WH7301> of the river <WH5158> of Thy delights. <WH5730>
For with Thee is the fountain <WH4726> of life; <WH9132> In Thy light <WH216> we see <WH7200> light. <WH216>
O continue <WH4900> Thy lovingkindness <WH2617> to those who know <WH3045> Thee, And Thy righteousness <WH6666> to the upright <WH3477> in heart. <WH3820>
Let not the foot <WH7272> of pride <WH1346> come <WH935> upon me, And let not the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563> drive <WH5110> me away. <WH5110>
There <WH8033> the doers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> have fallen; <WH5307> They have been thrust <WH1760> down <WH1760> and cannot <WH3201> <WH3808> rise. <WH6965>
